pages.text: Due to the number of mods installed in our pack, there's quite a few default hotkey collisions between what's installed. The following keybinds have been reset in our distribution, but you're welcome to adjust them as desired.

$(li)$(2)$(k:emotecraft.fastchoose)$() Emote Wheel$(li)$(2)$(k:antique_atlas.open)$() Open Atlas$(li)$(2)$(k:levelz.openskillscreen)$() View skill screen$(li)$(2)$(k:voice_chat)$() Voice chat settings$(li)$(2)$(k:mute_microphone)$() Mute$(li)$(2)$(k:disable_voice_chat)$() Disable voice$(li)$(2)$(k:iris.keybind.shaderPackSelection)$() Select Shaders$(li)$(2)$(k:iris.keybind.toggleShaders)$() Toggle Shaders
